means: 融化( ablate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The ablated area, complete ablation rate and local recurrence were evaluated.
sentence.Network_cn: 观察组织消融范围 、 肿瘤完全消融率和局部复发率.

sentence.Network_en: Results These pathways were successfully ablated in 9 patients.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果本组10例患者,射频消融9条旁道成功.

sentence.Network_en: Results A total of 115 PVs were ablated, and 78 ( 67.8 % ) of them achieved the endpoint.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果　总计消融115根肺静脉, 其中78根 ( 67.8% ) 达到消融终点.

list.abs: ...消融碛消融碛（ablation moraine）是冰川消融后退时在冰川末端的堆积，多为冰碛块砾散布于冰川槽谷中，细粒物质已为冰融水冲走。国际上有的认.
射频消融(Radiofrequency Ablation) 在超声波或电脑断层扫描期间用幼针插进肿瘤，透过针传送无线电波，将肿瘤加热毁灭。
ablation moraine 消融碛ablation skin 熔蚀皮ablation till 消融碛
可以微波消融（Microwave ablation）或射频消融（Radio-frequency ablation）治疗。发表于 2012-04-25 17:02:48 提示：专家发表的 …

means.word_mean: 1. made smaller or less by melting or erosion or vaporization;
2. removed or taken away by cutting or erosion or melting or evaporation;
